actions.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment authorizes the Secretary of Defense to prescribe regulations under which the Assistant Secretary of Defense for Special Operations and Low Intensity Conflict may award a fellowship to eligible persons.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 109-461 to authorize the Secretary of Defense to prescribe regulations under which the Assistant Secretary of Defense for Special Operations and Low Intensity Conflict may award a fellowship to eligible persons.
